title: Applications of MXenes in hydrogen evolution/oxygen evolution and nitrogen reduction reactions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00556B, Perspective
Divya Bajpai Tripathy
Extensive exploration has been conducted on MXenes to comprehend their inherent physical and chemical properties, leading to the discovery of their diverse functional applications across various domains.
